rows: Current status of the card, for example, "Active," "Issued," "Closed."
The card number in masked format, for example, **** **** **** 1111. The full number is stored securely in the "Full number" object column and cannot be entered manually.
Card category (e.g., Visa Electron, MasterCard Gold). Linked with thePayment systemfield.
Whether the card is "Credit" or "Debit." Changes the layout and available fields.

html:
Field

Description

Status

Current status of the card, for example, "Active," "Issued," "Closed."

Masked number

The card number in masked format, for example, **** **** **** 1111. The full number is stored securely in the "Full number" object column and cannot be entered manually.

Category

Card category (e.g., Visa Electron, MasterCard Gold). Linked with the Payment system field.

Type

Whether the card is "Credit" or "Debit." Changes the layout and available fields.

Contact

Customer affiliated with this card.

Legal entity

Company associated with the customer.

Cardholder

Person who physically holds the card.

Primary

Marks the card as primary for a linked bank account or loan.
